round_info.description: Coding problems with specific constraints that restrict the use of certain keywords, functions, or approaches.

questions.question: Write a function to reverse a string without using any built-in reverse methods or loops.
constraints: No using array methods like map, forEach, etc.
questions.evaluation_criteria: Function should use recursion or other creative approaches to reverse the string without violating constraints.

questions.question: Implement a function to find the maximum element in an array without using Math.max, comparison operators (>, <, >=, <=), or sorting.
questions.evaluation_criteria: Function should use creative approaches like bit manipulation, mathematical operations, or other non-comparison methods.

questions.question: Write a function to check if a number is prime without using division (/) or modulo (%) operators.
constraints: No using Math.sqrt() or similar functions
Must handle edge cases (1, 2, negative numbers)
questions.evaluation_criteria: Function should use multiplication, subtraction, or other creative mathematical approaches to determine primality.
